title: custom typeface? Need Help Please...
content:
Please help identify this for a logo recreation..  
Thank You for any help. I really appreciate it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019231509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/adirondacks_5011.jpg)

 [‹ Can someone id this typeface?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019231509/http:/typophile.com/node/50541 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Matrix body copy typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019231509/http:/typophile.com/node/50590 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Munnymike88

comments.content:
Felt Tip Roman by Mark Simonson :)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/felt-tip-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019231509/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/felt-tip-roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/felt-tip-roman/")
Thank you very much. You made my life so much easier!
